text: "Why Don't You Spend the Night" is a 1980 song by country singer Ronnie Milsap and is the leading single from his 11th studio album Milsap Magic. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts and number 2 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Country songs Category:Ronnie Milsap songs
title: Why Don't You Spend the Night
